text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1987-88 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1987 to June 30, 1988), see the links below ==References== ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1987-88
title: List of 1987–88 NBA season transactions
